question:
Which of the following countries are the founding members of International North-South Transportation Corridor (INSTC)?
  1. Russia
  2. Iran
  3. India
  4. China
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Russia, Iran and India are the founding members of the International North-South Transportation Corridor (INSTC). They signed the agreement for the NSTC project on the 16th of May 2002. International North-South Transportation Corridor (INSTC) aims at connecting India with Russia and Europe via Iran â€” a dry run of container movement via the green corridor (smooth customs facilitation). It would facilitate the movement of goods through the ship, rail, and road route for moving freight between India, Russia and Iran.
